description: A shimmering silvery dust.  Narcotic with the street name of Faewild.  Causes the user to see colors not normally visible to the naked human eye.

use_action.activation_message: You rub the glittering dust into your gums.

description: A drug that became popular over the last few years before the cataclysm.  It appears to be exactly as it's street name, a dark purple lotus blossum.  It's known to be a strong painkiller while also causing vivid hallucinations.

use_action.activation_message: You eat the purple lotus blossom.
